name: workday-nlui-studio
description: A local, browser-based design studio that turns natural-language prompts into authentic Workday UI using React, Vite, AI, and Canvas Kit v14 with official fonts and design system.

scripts.dev: cross-env VITE_TW_ENABLED=true TW_ENABLED=true concurrently "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:client"
scripts.build: cross-env VITE_TW_ENABLED=true TW_ENABLED=true tsc && vite build && tsc -p server/tsconfig.json
scripts.build:client: cross-env VITE_TW_ENABLED=true TW_ENABLED=true tsc && vite build
scripts.tw:on: cross-env VITE_TW_ENABLED=true TW_ENABLED=true concurrently "npm run dev:server" "vite"
scripts.tw:off: cross-env VITE_TW_ENABLED=false TW_ENABLED=false concurrently "npm run dev:server" "vite"
scripts.tw:build:on: cross-env VITE_TW_ENABLED=true TW_ENABLED=true npm run build
scripts.tw:build:off: cross-env VITE_TW_ENABLED=false TW_ENABLED=false npm run build
